reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW! Impressive laundry sheets; clean clothes, nice scent, great price, and eco-friendly.
reviews.reviewText: I used Blue Water Orange scent with my towels and sheets for the first time and I am impressed with the softness of the towels. Everything was clean and smells clean with a very light scent of freshness. I have tried other laundry sheets and rate Blue Water at the top of the list.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pads Are Great !!
reviews.reviewText: Better than bringing home a heavy gallon or 2 of detergent.. I find if i put some dawn dishwashing liquid with these pads it cleans really good.. i noticed when i first used them they were cleaning the clothes good... but i wanted better so i just started using Dawn with them as well.. it works well together and my clothes smell super good and super fresh... its better than all those harsh detergents and oh so light weight.. I would recommend anyone who washes clothes to give this a try... think you will be pleased as i am with this..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great cleaning ,excellent scent but is not absorbed by clothing.This do far my favorite laundry soap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient, Good Price
reviews.reviewText: These laundry detergent sheets are an excellent alternative to the big plastic laundry detergent jugs that are clogging up our garbage dumps and waterways. They are very convenient, too. The box takes up very little space in my limited laundry room cupboards. And, unlike detergent pods, the sheets are conveniently perforated so that a half sheet can be used in smaller loads. The fragrance of the sheets prior to use is a bit too potent for my sensitive nose; however, the scent does not linger on the washed clothing. Convenient, reasonably priced, and much better for our troubled environment than are plastic jugs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. I love how much plastic I am keeping out of land fields. It also takes up less space in my laundry room. And it works just like any other soap. I have two kids and my husband works in the oil field. This soap gets EVERYTHING clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Used to be great
reviews.reviewText: These sheets used to be great and super convenient. I'm not sure if there was a formulation change but they are not dissolving fully anymore. The sheets that had the biodegradable bag were fine. The new box I got without the bag isn't. We have had them stuck to the washer walls partially dissolved and residue on shirts. I typically wash on warm so there shouldn't be an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Cleans well, I tear the sheet and put it in the detergent dispenser instead of tossing it in the drum. I usually get free and clear liquid form of detergent as everything irritates my skin. I bought the fresh linen scent and have had NO issues. The scent is a little strong when opening the pack (for those of you with sensitivities) i just keep the inside liner bag closed, but no heavy perfume once washed, and no skin irritations. I am definitely going to continue purchasing. I use a half sheet for most of my loads, with good results and a full sheet for extra large or more heavily soiled items

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a great find; recommend looking into
reviews.reviewText: My hubby first found this for washing clothes and I was blown away because of the "extremely reasonable price AND how well it works. After this I decided to find dishwasher strips - also good for the environment and I have been extremely pleased. Not only do my dishes come clean, they come sparkling clean. SAVE ALOT OF MONEY AND HELP THE ENVIRONMENT.
